page.title: 16Industry
page.content: Industry in the Eastfield Estate. Eastfield Estate is the main industrial area in Scarborough and all the time more industries are being built.Because Scarborough is a holiday resort industry is not of great importance to the town.Eastfield industrial estate is situated approximately 8 km from the town.The main industrial area had not started to develop until the early 70's.The main categories of industry include:_ Constructional Steel Works,Plastic Works,Electrical Suppliers,Welding Suppliers,Car Repairs,Breweries, Adhesives Materials,Farm Equipment, Coach Builders,Hire Services,Cash and Carry,Printers and service industries such as a training centre for Handicapped People.Also a testing station for heavy goods vehicles and drivers.
